title: Start the summer in this Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property
description:
Start the summer in this Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property originally designed in 1951! Enter through the spacious remodeled lobby where you are greeted by a 24 hour front desk attendant. The property features a fitness center on the lower level along with common areas where you can relax and watch TV or catch up with friends with a game of pool. There's also a place to store your bike in the designated bike room. Looking for outdoor space? There's a roof deck that offers panoramic views of the city! The views are simply breathtaking! This large one bedroom has beautiful hardwood parquet floors and a view you will LOVE! The living area and bedrooms are spacious and have tons of closet space. SUPER Pet Friendly!! Come see what all the buzz is about at The Parkway House and everything that living in the Art Museum area has to offer!! ***Pictures featured are of the new model unit.***
Get ready to kick off your summer in style at The Parkway House, a Philadelphia Chapter Landmark Property originally designed in 1951. Step into the property's spacious remodeled lobby, where a friendly 24-hour front desk attendant warmly welcomes you. This meticulously maintained property offers an array of amenities that will elevate your living experience.
Stay active and fit in the on-site fitness center located on the lower level, equipped with state-of-the-art equipment to support your wellness goals. Unwind and socialize with friends in the inviting common areas, where you can relax, watch TV, or challenge them to a friendly game of pool. For cycling enthusiasts, a designated bike room is available to securely store your bike.
Yearning for a breath of fresh air and stunning views? Look no further than the rooftop deck, offering panoramic vistas of the city that will simply take your breath away. Enjoy the perfect setting for sunsets, starry nights, or simply soaking in the vibrant energy of Philadelphia from above.
Inside the spacious one-bedroom apartment, you'll discover beautiful hardwood parquet floors that exude timeless elegance. The large living area and bedrooms provide ample space to relax and unwind, and you'll find an abundance of closet space to keep your belongings organized and easily accessible. Prepare to be captivated by the view from your apartment, as it promises to be a sight you'll truly adore.
At The Parkway House, your furry friends are more than welcome. The property prides itself on being super pet-friendly, allowing you and your four-legged companions to enjoy the comforts of home together.
Located in the sought-after Art Museum area, The Parkway House places you in the heart of Philadelphia's vibrant cultural scene. Immerse yourself in the abundance of art, history, and world-class museums just steps away. Experience the buzz and excitement of living in an area that seamlessly blends urban convenience with a welcoming neighborhood atmosphere.
Please note that the pictures featured are of the new model unit, providing a glimpse of the high-quality finishes and attention to detail you can expect in your own apartment at The Parkway House.
Don't miss this incredible opportunity to become a part of this iconic Philadelphia property. Come and see for yourself why The Parkway House is the place to be. Schedule a viewing today and embrace the exceptional lifestyle that awaits you!

title: Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living!
description:
Enjoy the convenience of luxury of Center City living in this 1-Bedroom 1-Bathroom on the 18th floor of The Ellington! This spacious home offers wonderful light and city views from the oversized windows, an abundance of storage throughout the home, and an in-unit washer and dryer. You enter the home through a foyer with a hanging closet that leads you to the generous living/dining room. The kitchen is outfitted with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, and an abundance of cabinet and counter space. The large bedroom offers a deep double closet and even more incredible city views. The bathroom is off the bedroom and offers a linen closet, tile floors, and a combination shower/tub. 1-year lease is required. Tenant is responsible for electricity and internet/cable TV. Tenant can have cats. Fees include a $300 move-in fee and $200 lease fee to the Ellington. The Ellington is a high-rise on the 1500 block of Chestnut St. The building offers a 24-hour door person and fitness center. All homes are wired for either Comcast or Verizon FiOS High-Speed Internet and Cable. Residents can have up to 2 pets that are under 40 lbs. Located in the heart of Center City, you’re close to everything you need: fabulous dining options such as Butcher & Singer, Marathon Grill, The Oyster House, Harp & Crown, Guiseppe's and Sons, and Elixr Coffee Roasters, only one block away from the incredible shopping Walnut St has to offer. Getting around the city couldn’t be easier as you are steps from a plethora of bus lines, the Broad Street Line subway, and Suburban Station. title: You’ll never want to leave your neighborhood!
description:
This unit features an extra room which can be used as an office or an additional bedroom Welcome to your new home, 735 Spruce Street, located in the heart of Philadelphia’s charming and historic Washington Square West neighborhood. This apartment features tall ceilings, a spacious floor plan, plenty of storage space, and oversized windows. Washington Square houses a large collection of historic 18th and 19th-century residential architecture that offers you a glimpse into Philadelphia’s past. A charming district filled with cobblestone streets and brick structures, you will never tire of the wide array of dining, shopping, sightseeing, and museums. Local attractions include Washington Square Park (5-min walk) and Penn’s Landing (along the waterfront), while historic attractions include the Liberty Bell and Independence Hall. Whole Foods Market, ACME, and one of the most well-known restaurants in Philadelphia, Zahav, are all within walking distance of the Properties. With so many local amenities you’ll never want to leave your neighborhood! 735 Spruce is also immediately catty-corner to Pennsylvania Hospital, offering nurses, residents, doctors, and employees of the nearby institution immediate access to housing.

title: Fully updated 2 bedroom, 2 bath unit available
description:
438-438 Cross St, Philadelphia, PA 19147
Adjacent lot/Side yard is included in rental price Welcome to 438 Cross Street, a lovely 3-story traditional home with an adjacent lot to be used at your discretion, currently a beautiful side yard/urban oasis! This three-story home resides on a quiet tree-lined South Philly block within the coveted 19147 zip code with super easy access to highways and walking distance to the activities on Passions Square, as well as being steps away from Dickinson Square Park and popular restaurants and cafes. The house features a third-floor master suite with a full bathroom and a vaulted ceiling. The second-floor bedroom is filled with natural light from two large north-facing windows and is large enough to accommodate a queen-sized bed. There is also a full bath on this floor The first-floor entry welcomes you to the sweet living/dining area and the kitchen toward the back, but the big surprise is the kitchen-accessed rear yard and the fabulous, green side yard for sunning and planting all through the spring and summer. Features include central air, large closets, and first-floor laundry. It is partially carpeted. The adjacent lot can be used as an extra yard or garden.
Would you just want to take a look at the apartment? Send me a message.

title: Spaciousness of true loft living! Welcome home!
description:
Welcome to Lofts 640 in the heart of Philadelphia, PA! Your monthly rent includes extended cable TV service, access to our fitness center, indoor/heated pool and hot tub with an attached outdoor roof deck, yoga/fitness studio, cyber lounge, 24/7 front desk attendant and more! As you enter 640 North Broad, you'll step away from the busy street and into an urban space that artfully blends the old with the new. The original character of the building has been enhanced by modern accents and furnishings, creating a unique and sophisticated environment. Our community is vibrant and welcoming, with state-of-the-art amenities designed to nurture both body and spirit. You'll love relaxing in our glass-domed pool house, where the warm salt water pool and Jacuzzi spa offer the perfect respite from the stresses of daily life. Meet and socialize with fellow residents on our rooftop deck lounge, or take advantage of our cyber cafe and yoga studio to stay connected and centered. Our lobby is a work of art, featuring geometric ceiling lights that illuminate the mocha-colored floors. With stunning white and stainless steel accents, the lobby is the perfect introduction to the energy and excitement of Loft 640. Located just six blocks from City Hall on Broad Street, our community is centrally located to shops, restaurants, hospitals, and the thriving community of Fairmount. Reading Terminal Market and the Pennsylvania Convention Center are just minutes away. Living at Loft 640 is the perfect combination of the commuter convenience of center city living and the spaciousness of true loft living. Welcome home!
